remarks: Value of the uncurry functor on a morphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2017.)
statement:
uncfval.g $e |- F = ( <" C D E "> uncurryF G ) $.

uncfval.d $e |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) $.

uncf1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.

uncf2.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. B ) $.
